item.title: Swathes of rubbish along curb, 4th January
item.description:
The street is rarely cleaned and lots of rubbish has been blown or knocked off the curb into the gutter/road. Currently glass and plastic bottles, bags, clothes, dog poo littering the place. Further up the street is an oven rack sitting in the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ravenscroft Road, Anerley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish dumped on the street, 4th January
item.description:
There's rubbish dumped on the street by the bins, including a big cardboard box, that has been sitting there for a while. This is a recurring problem, the bins placed in this location attract more rubbish and littering
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 204, Union Street, Southwark, Greater London

item.title: Mobility scooter abandoned / stolen?, 4th January
item.description:
Saw this today in the A2 underpass behind Aldi. Kidbrooke park road. SE3 It’s actually in the tunnel as shown in photo. So I do not have a road name. Concerned as it possibly preventing someone with a disability getting around.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kidbrooke Park Road, Kidbrooke, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Untaxed Vehicle, 4th January
item.description:
This vehicle which l previously reported in August (ref: 8014008) as having been abandoned and parked here for months is now untaxed! Possibly it’s stolen, are the council not able to check whether this is the case and get it moved sooner?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crescent Road, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox, 4th January
item.description:
At the corner of Ridgeway Avenue and Cat Hill, sadly there is a dead fox. Please can this be removed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5a, Ridgeway Avenue, East Barnet, Greater London

item.title: Very icy, 4th January
item.description:
The turning circle on Porrington Close is very icy and slippery, especially on the side of the road toward no's 1&2. The steep incline makes the issue worse. Can we please have it gritted?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Porrington Close, Elmstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Repeat litter issue at 38 Barrett’s Grove, 4th January
item.description:
It appears the bins are not adequate for the estate. They are constantly overflowing resulting in litter going to the rest of the community.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Barretts Grove, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped Vehicle, 4th January
item.description:
Vehicle has been dumped, black car, 5 door, right hand side, drivers seat mirror has be knocked in/hit. Car is parked just after a roundabout and slightly obstructive with it being a busy bus route. Car has been here since before Christmas, roughly about the 19th/20th December 2025
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 194, Poverest Road, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Thick ice over all footpaths and road on close. Pavement is very dangerous and needs griting, 4th January
item.description:
The entire close is covered in thick ice and is dangerous to elderly residents. Would it be at all possible to have the footpaths gritted in some form please? Many elderly residents live here
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sparkes Close, Widmore, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned bedroom furniture, 4th January
item.description:
This mangled carcass of a bed has been left outside 45 Hoxton Square to slowly rot for the last 4 days. Given the weather I am concerned it may attract nesting vermin.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hoxton Square, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
